definition: to wash/to squander/to sweep away/to move/to shake/dissolute/pond
variant of 燙|烫[tang4]/variant of 趟[tang4]

sentences.english: He was notorious as a gambler and rake.
sentences.chinese: 他是声名狼藉的赌徒和浪荡子。

sentences.english: Friendship! It is a tie that binds fools and profligates.
sentences.chinese: 友谊只是联结傻瓜和浪荡公子的纽带。

sentences.english: Your lips are soft and sweet. Your debauch is peerless in the world.
sentences.chinese: 你的嘴巴温柔甜蜜，你的浪荡天下第一。

sentences.english: He is a typical B. T. O.
sentences.chinese: 他是个典型的浪荡公子。

sentences.english: This actually is the art of aestheticism dandy ideas.
sentences.chinese: 这实际就是唯美主义浪荡子的艺术主张。

sentences.english: Possibly I let others be restless dissolutely, only then met the result to die in battle.
sentences.chinese: 可能我浪荡让人家不安，才会结果都阵亡。

sentences.english: You know my vagabond and restless habits .
sentences.chinese: 你知道我的闲游浪荡的习惯。

sentences.english: "Love them and leave them" was the motto of the amorous Don Juan.
sentences.chinese: “爱她们随后抛弃她们”是风流浪荡子唐璜的座右铭。

sentences.english: I do not want to stay in that space of fluency dissipated .
sentences.chinese: 我不想再停留在那流利浪荡的空间中了。

sentences.english: A doctor sends over a pair of swingers to "counsel" the couple.
sentences.chinese: 医生发送过来一副浪荡公子以“律师”的情侣。
他是个粗枝大叶的浪荡子。

sentences.english: So how do you dress like a rake?
sentences.chinese: 那么你怎样才能打扮得像一个浪荡公子哥？

sentences.english: Before he got married, Jack used to be really wild.
sentences.chinese: 杰克结婚前是个浪荡公子。

definition: distinguished and accomplished/outstanding/talented in letters and unconventional in lifestyle/romantic/dissolute/loose
lit. to enjoy the beautiful spring scenery (idiom)/fig. to frequent brothels/to sow one's wild oats
to spend one's time in drinking and pleasure (idiom); to indulge in sensual pleasures/life of debauchery
